decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - All external works,  including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution, including colour, texture, face-bond and pointing of external brickwork.
Condition : 3 - No plumbing or pipes, other than rainwater pipes, shall be fixed on the external faces of the building unless shown on the approved drawings.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the submitted drawings, full structural details (which may be a duplicate of a Building Regulations "full plans" application) shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved prior to the commencement of works.

Condition : 6 - External brickwork, mortar, face-bond and pointing, and cleaning of brickwork shall conform to the advice given in Technical Note 1 of the Bedford Park Society's handbook for residents and architects.
Condition : 7 - The boundary wall and fencing details shall conform with the advice given in Technical Note 2 of the Bedford Park Society's handbook for residents and architects.
Condition : 8 - External joinery details shall conform to the advice given in Technical Note 3 of the Bedford Park Society's handbook for residents and architects.

Condition : 9 - Before the relevant part of the work is commenced a scheme showing specifications for the rendering and painting of the brickwork white on the flank wall of the utility room, and any replacement rendering on the flank wall of the property facing No. 16, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, and the works completed in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 10 - Before work commences on the removal of rendering on the front elevation of of the property, a trial area shall be completed and made available for inspection by an officer from the Local Planning Authority. If the brickwork exposed is unsatisfactory in appearance the area(s) shall be re-rendered or otherwise treated in accordance with a scheme first to be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and completed in accordance with the submitted details.
description: Amended plans for the approved scheme ref 01234/18/P6 dated 09/03/2006 for the erection of part two storey part single storey rear extension erection of single storey side extension alteration to garage roof incorporating external and internal alterations erection of new front boundary fencing and approved plans 01234/18/P7 dated 21/12/06 for the "creation of basement with lightwell to rear elevation to the existing house" to incorporate revised external and internal alterations, with changes to elevations of the proposed conservatory
